CustomField.formula:
IF(Account.Membership_IsLocalClub__pc = TRUE,
IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.AAA_Membership_Level__c, "Premier"), ISPICKVAL(Account.AAA_Membership_Level__c, "Premier RV") ), ServiceContract.ParentServiceContract.AAA_Long_Tow_Consumed__c = FALSE ), "Yes",IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.AAA_Membership_Level__c, "Premier"), ISPICKVAL(Account.AAA_Membership_Level__c, "Premier RV") ), ServiceContract.ParentServiceContract.AAA_Long_Tow_Consumed__c = TRUE ), "No", "N/A" ))
, IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.AAA_Membership_Level__c, "Premier"), ISPICKVAL(Account.AAA_Membership_Level__c, "Premier RV")), Account.AAA_200_Miles_Premier_Tow__c = TRUE) , "Yes" , "No") )
CustomField.label: Premier Long Tow Available
